name: Undersurv
description:
An exciting new text-based survival game!

Control what your character does via...

EXPLORE:

A random exploration function which will take you to a random location

EQUIP:

Use crazy gear you find to defend yourself against all that stands in your way

EAT/DRINK:

Chow down and slurp up to survive in the dank depths

CRAFT:

Create unique gear to defend yourself from foes

MAP:

Visit important past locations to discover the strange places of this unknown land!

THE DEMO IS OUT NOW

- A small amount of places to explore and a small amount of weapons

- Endless (You cannot beat the game)

ENJOY
